name: VidLii Compact HTML5 (YouTube 2007 Inspired)
description:
Optimized for 90% page zoom. Makes VidLii more YouTube 2008-esque
(Not supported in full screen with Google Chrome/ium)
additional_info:
4:3 mode retired due to difficult maintenance with recent site updates. Script is the same otherwise.
Some fonts enlarged, wider description box, narrower video player.
